Comment: How can you tell? Is it b/c their account was created a year ago but comments only start 15 days ago? The comments themselves wouldn’t tip me off.
Author: InterestingTry5190

Comment: Which is why I point it out, so we can all be better educated.  Every reply is a tight one-liner with the same "setup -> punchline” rhythm. Human posters mix sentence lengths.  Repeated use of "At this point…," "Of course…," rhetorical questions and metaphors are uniformly in almost every 2nd/3rd reply. It’s all broad-stroke snark.  Astrophes are ’ and not '. (Not an indicator alone, but a data point worth noting. Same as emdashes instead of hyphens—like this.)  Two weeks old, posts in a batch and then logs off to change accounts. They never follow-up on comments.
Author: Middle-Theory-8462

Comment: I appreciate you taking the time to explain. I genuinely want to know what to look for.
Author: InterestingTry5190
